alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 12:57PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Logan, Simpson and western Warren Counties through 1245 PM CST... At 1157 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Russellville to 15 miles east of Elkton to 11 miles east of Guthrie. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crestmoor, Memphis Junction, Plum Springs, Mount Victor and Bowling Green. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
